quote: One of the hardest things for me, now that I'm famous, is finding people who can read my stuff and give me an honest critique.
author: Ken Follett

quote: I've never worried about being rich or famous - for me, it's all about the dancing.
author: Anton du Beke

quote: Just because you're not famous, doesn't mean you're not good.
author: Laura Linney

quote: It's quite a famous story that takes place on Christmas Eve, and the Germans, French, and Scottish are trying to make peace one night and they bury their dead and they play football. I play a German opera singer, in German, which I never have so I am really excited about that.
author: Diane Kruger

quote: I was a latchkey kid, so when I saw the 'Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous,' that showed me that there was a different type of lifestyle out there. I was curious about it and amazed about it.
author: Loni Love

quote: On the banks of the Nile, the Rosetta branch, I lived an enjoyable childhood in the City of Disuq, which is the home of the famous mosque, Sidi Ibrahim.
author: Ahmed Zewail

quote: Our top story tonight: Famous TV dolphin flipper was arrested today on prostitution ring charges. He allegedly was seen transporting two 16 year olds across state line for immoral porpoises.
author: Colin Mochrie

quote: I think anytime with your mom, whether she's famous or not, you're watching what she's doing when you're growing up. She also taught me the basics: Make sure you use a good moisturizing shampoo and conditioner, and then use a detangler to comb through your hair. And don't overdo the heat styling.
author: Jillian Hervey

quote: I'm famous for being nicer to my fans than anyone on the face of the Earth because I figure a) They pay my salary, and b) It's probably like a big moment in your life to meet somebody so I would say, just come on up.
author: James Woods

quote: Fame changes everything. When you're well-known, you're expected to be different. Some people assume you must have a yacht and four homes. Or that you're famous because you are 'A Decent Man'.
author: Michael Palin

quote: I just cannot imagine why anyone would want to be really famous. You go to a restaurant and people are pointing at you and they talk about you and they whisper and it is very disconcerting; it is a very odd feeling.
author: Jack Horner

quote: I never got into things to be famous. Sometimes it's fun, sometimes it's annoying.
author: Judah Friedlander

quote: A sign of celebrity is that his name is often worth more than his services.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: The only reason I became the singer in the band is because I sang the best. It wasn't out of some desire to be a star or be a famous singer. It's not like I love interviews.
author: Adam Levine

quote: Living in L.A., everyone likes to mold you and change you. I don't care about fame, I don't care about being a celebrity. I know that's part of the job, but I don't feed into anyone's idea of who I should be.
author: Jessica Alba

quote: I think that once you open the door and allow people in on a certain aspect, it's very hard to then control how far that ripple effect is. So I think that the person who is known or famous has the ability to decide what they do or don't want to share.
author: Rosie O'Donnell

quote: Becoming famous is a really shocking thing, especially when you don't have aspirations to it. It got to the point where I would try and avoid making eye contact with anyone. It was freaky, and it just happened overnight. I couldn't handle it.
author: Alison Moyet

quote: It doesn't matter if they're famous or not - I just want to meet other creative people who can maybe bring something different to the studio than what I have. I think that's the most important thing for me.
author: Tiesto

quote: When I was seven years old, I fell in love with a series published by Bobbs-Merrill called 'The Childhood of Famous Americans.' In it, historical figures like Clara Barton, Nancy Hanks, Elias Howe, Patrick Henry, and dozens more came to life for me as children.
author: Ann Hood

quote: I have an innate fear of fame. I've never thought being famous looked like such a good place to be. I love being incognito.
author: Phoebe Philo

quote: When I was younger, I used to say, One day I'll be famous.
author: Katie Price

quote: I was with a famous comedian when a young fan walked up and asked for an autograph. The comedian blew him off. I'll never forget the look on the young boy's face. He was devastated.
author: Louie Anderson

quote: When you're in a relationship with a very famous person, you have to make compromises.
author: David Furnish

quote: I seek no longer to be a 'famous' person, and instead I wish to live a 'normal' life.
author: Sinead O'Connor

quote: The first famous winemaking consultant was the late professor Emile Peynaud, who reigned over Bordeaux throughout the 1940s, '50s, '60s and '70s.
author: Robert M. Parker, Jr.

quote: I wanted to be a political science professor and go to school in Boston. I never wanted to be a big, famous movie star and TV star. It kind of found me.
author: Eliza Dushku

quote: It feels like Radiohead are famous, but that no one knows who we are. Which is brilliant, really.
author: Jonny Greenwood

quote: Some of the things I've seen a lot of my female-actress friends who are relatively famous receive - I've seen some hideous things. Like some really, really bad things... like, the FBI should be contacted immediately.
author: Elisha Cuthbert

quote: When I was a child, I saw in the news that a person from Belitung had done well in sports in Jakarta, and I just couldn't imagine that it was possible for someone from here to become famous, and it's still very isolated out here.
author: Andrea Hirata

quote: It's hard to have a bad hair day when you're famous.
author: Marion Jones

quote: Celebrity distorts democracy by giving the rich, beautiful, and famous more authority than they deserve.
author: Maureen Dowd

quote: As blue chips turn into penny stocks, Wall Street seems less like a symbol of America's macho capitalism and more like that famous Jane Austen character Mrs. Bennet, a flibbertigibbet always anxious about getting richer and her 'poor nerves.'
author: Maureen Dowd

quote: I don't have any expectations as an actor, and being rich and famous is not my driving force.
author: James D'arcy

quote: I never set out to be rich and famous. I wanted to follow my own path.
author: Matthew Modine

quote: I don't see myself as famous; I see myself as a normal person with a job that is not very normal. My work life is very out there and very public. But I do my best to maintain my privacy.
author: Hailey Baldwin

quote: A woman who becomes famous through her work reduces her erotic value. A woman is permitted to chat or babble, but speaking in public with authority is still the greatest transgression.
author: Elfriede Jelinek

quote: I didn't start making music in order to be famous.
author: Mark Ronson

quote: It isn't false modesty when I say this, but although I am supposed to be a famous person it doesn't mean anything to me. I just sit at home and work.
author: Gyorgy Ligeti

quote: I do not take any pleasure whatsoever in being a famous person.
author: Donna Leon

quote: There is less pressure as a character actor. It generally means that you will be acting for all of your life, which is my intention. It is not my intention to just be a rich and famous person, that would be pretty boring.
author: Tim Roth

quote: Italy is famous for fashion, food, Ferrari, and furniture - furniture was a segment where the companies in the high end are all small.
author: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo

quote: If there's anything more mortifying than being famous at 14, it's being washed up right after.
author: Moon Unit Zappa

quote: When I was young, anywhere I would go in Germany, I would see my father's posters. Everyone knew about him. And he had many friends who were artists who were also quite famous. So, for me, it seemed very natural to be an artist and be known.
author: Ruth Bernhard

quote: Ursula Nordstrom was famous for finding artists in unlikely places. Maurice Sendak was a window designer, and she just came across one of his windows. Everyone was looking to find a talent.
author: Peter Sis

quote: I don't want to be famous. I want to tell stories.
author: Carrie Coon

quote: I never thought about being famous.
author: Damon Wayans

quote: I was very famous as a young man and I celebrated both the good and bad times with drinking.
author: Glenn Hughes

quote: I'm so fascinated by YouTube culture. I have no idea how it's working, but more and more people are becoming Internet famous, and it is because it allows you to have an atmosphere in which you feel comfortable to be yourself, which you might not get otherwise.
author: Aubrey Peeples

quote: I've always been passionate about acting. I haven't been passionate about being famous.
author: David Alpay

quote: I've always been successful. Now I'm famous and successful.
author: Chazz Palminteri

quote: If it's not some daring, dangerous affair, it's just not interesting, or so it seems. So, here you have two people - a famous American iconic couple - who actually like each other sexually, in marriage. Imagine.
author: Shelley Long

quote: My father was this famous heart surgeon, a wonderful man... but there was something about me that drove him crazy.
author: Dominick Dunne

quote: My plan for the online version of 'Famous Monsters' is to become an online 'uncle' to an entire group of people who have never read or heard of 'Famous Monsters of Filmland.' The site will not be written in a scholarly fashion. It will be written in a playful, 'Hey, check this out!' kind of way.
author: Harry Knowles

quote: There are some famous people, and I've met them, who you might think are great, and then you meet them, and you discover that they not only have feet but heads of clay.
author: Anne Beatts

quote: Of course, Hollywood is still making some excellent pictures which reflect the great artistry that made Hollywood famous throughout the world, but these films are exceptions, judging from box office returns and press reviews.
author: Pola Negri

quote: We are not interested in cloning the Michael Jordans and the Michael Jacksons of this world. The rich and the famous don't participate in this.
author: Panayiotis Zavos

quote: The Galapagos Islands are probably the most famous wildlife-watching destination in the world. And no wonder - it's almost impossible to exaggerate the sheer spectacle of the place that provided inspiration for Charles Darwin's ground-breaking theory of natural selection.
author: Mark Carwardine

quote: Wherever I go, there's always a child, an old woman, that comes to me and wants to meet me. Not because I am famous but because they suffered with my family.
author: Elian Gonzalez

quote: You get to be famous or have some notoriety and there are so many people who want a piece of you.
author: Oscar De La Hoya

quote: More than anything else, my mother wanted to be an actress - a famous actress - which in the 1950s was all about being young, sexy, and available. She was all that, and more. She had big blue eyes, alabaster skin, a heart-shaped face, a beautiful figure. She was just a knockout.
author: Meredith Baxter

quote: I've never sat there and plotted out how I was going to become successful or famous.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Passion for fame: A passion which is the instinct of all great souls.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: The world is a bell curve. Classroom test scores, employee performance in a company or how many people really, really like you. No matter the population you're studying, they always fit neatly across the standard deviations of the famous bell curve.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: Famous, adj.: Conspicuously miserable.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I had no preconceived idea what fame would be like, because I never thought I would be famous. I just wanted to do my work. Hell, I just wanted to pay my rent on time.
author: Iyanla Vanzant

quote: How many famous and high-spirited heroes have lived a day too long?
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: I've watched a lot of people who became famous who completely change and I think it's because they tend to believe all the hype that's out there. I don't think there's that much hype about me.
author: Jane Goodall

quote: Of course, 'I Will Always Love You' is the biggest song so far in my career. I'm famous for several, but that one has been recorded by more people and made me more money, I think, than all of them. But that song did come from a true and deep place in my heart.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: I wanted to be famous for my music and my talent, and I always wished I could cut it out when I left the stage.
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: That's the most terrible thing about being an author - standing there at your mother's funeral, but you don't switch the author off. So your own innermost thoughts are grist for the mill. Who was it said - one of the famous lady novelists - 'unhappy is the family that contains an author'?
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: But I didn't ask to have somebody nose around in my private life. I didn't even ask to be famous. All I asked was to be able to earn a living making people laugh.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: I can't relate to people who treat me as a 'famous person.' I only like to hang around with people who treat me as a regular person because that's what I am. All people are really just regular.
author: Judy Blume

quote: You knew how humiliating that is as an experience for celebrities to be less of a celebrity. There's no class to adjust to being less famous, and you don't think you have to worry about it. But you do.
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: I was never very interested in boys - and there were plenty of them - vying with one another to see how many famous women they would get into the hay.
author: Bette Davis

quote: I don't know what 'famous' is, really.
author: Karl Pilkington

quote: I went from being totally unknown and never acting professionally to being in a major movie and being very famous. It all happened so quickly, I didn't have any time to work things out. It's been pretty scary at times.
author: Emma Watson

quote: I don't like Los Angeles. The people are awful and terribly shallow, and everybody wants to be famous but nobody wants to play the game. I'm from New York. I will kill to get what I need.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Joanne' is a progression for me. It was about going into the studio and forgetting that I was famous.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Yeah, I love being famous. It's almost like being white, y'know?
author: Chris Rock

quote: Sometimes people offer you plays, they offer you parts, but they only offer it because I'm famous.
author: Chris Rock

quote: I don't think it's anything you ever get used to... for many years, I could never sort of put my name in the same sort of category as the word 'famous' or anything like that. And I just found it very uncomfortable... if you get used to it, then something must be wrong.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: Did you ever stop to think why cops are always famous for being dumb? Simple. Because they don't have to be anything else.
author: Orson Welles

quote: I was the most famous kid in the United States. That was 1936.
author: Gore Vidal

quote: Becoming famous was never what I wanted to do. There's a lot of things that come with fame - it's what people in the limelight have to do.
author: Bruno Mars

quote: Being famous is great, it's not like bad or horrible or anything.
author: Dave Chappelle

quote: Andy Warhol made fame more famous.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: See, 'A Time to Kill' was the one I got famous off of. Big ka-boom, over one weekend. After that, I did films that I really wanted to do.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: Brooklyn was a famous team. I wanted to play for the Dodgers.
author: Roberto Clemente

quote: I never thought being famous would be wonderful, but my limited exposure to celebrity has shown me the dark side big-time.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Vegas is famous for a lot of things, and bad marriages are one of them. Margo and I are proof that you can make this work. It just takes a little effort.
author: Ron White

quote: If you become famous and don't have a live show to back it up, they're not going to pay you any money.
author: Ron White

quote: I begged the universe to make me a famous comedian, and it did. So I tend not to ask for any more.
author: Ron White

quote: I don't like to do material people have heard. Now, they like to hear material that they know, because that's the stuff that made me famous, and, unfortunately, I don't do a ton of it.
author: Ron White

quote: Many incredible artists die before they were famous.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Powerful women intimidate men. If she's a really well-known woman, she has a career, she's famous - in that case, men are really afraid.
author: Donatella Versace

quote: I have a show on MTV called 'Zach Stone Is Gonna Be Famous.' I think that's a secret to a vast majority of America.
author: Bo Burnham

quote: Being famous is complete luck, and that's something you can't bank on.
author: Bo Burnham

quote: I feel lucky, where I'm not 'famous' famous. I'm not someone that everyone kind of knows for no reason. If people know who I am, they like me because if they didn't like me, they forgot about me.
author: Bo Burnham

quote: You do not want to get married at 22! Especially if you're famous, because girls are going to be throwing themselves at you.
author: Usain Bolt

quote: Whether we are famous or not, we all need God. We also need other people.
author: Chuck Norris

quote: A while ago I said that, 'You know, I like a guy - he doesn't have to be all rich and famous - he can be normal.' And I remember I was walking in the mall, and this guy was like, 'Tyra, I'm normal. I live with my mama. I ain't got a car and I ain't got a job! I'm real normal.' And I'm like, 'That's not normal - that's a loser!'
author: Tyra Banks

quote: What I can't completely understand is most other people's fascination with what the famous among us do with their lips and the rest of their bodies. Why do ordinary people become the target of this curiosity simply by virtue of the fact that other people recognise their names and faces but know almost nothing else about them?
author: Alan Alda

quote: I had never really wanted to be famous. Everyone is supposed to want to be rich and famous, but as a boy I never knew what rich was, and the first view I had of famous made me leery.
author: Alan Alda

quote: I am not a name-dropper. I can't help it if everybody I know is famous.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: I really feel like it's a travesty to make a child famous. I really do.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: I could have been a dental hygienist with nothing bad ever appearing in print about me, but that's not how I've chosen to lead my life. I knew that you put yourself under a microscope the more famous you become.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: I'm willing to make compromises based on someone I think is the one, but I think it's psychologically important to people when they're famous to be the only famous person they know.
author: John Mayer

quote: A very quiet and tasteful way to be famous is to have a famous relative. Then you can not only be nothing, you can do nothing too.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I got the famous Oprah hug!
author: Taylor Lautner

quote: One famous movie executive, who shall remain nameless, exposed himself to me in his office. 'Mr X,' I said, 'I thought you were a producer, not an exhibitor.'
author: Shirley Temple

quote: Do you remember the wrestler Andre the Giant? Famous. He had acromegaly.
author: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: And I want to do it the right way, like everybody else, not just a famous figurehead that gets a job because he is a famous basketball player. I want to really learn the business.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: It's hard to say I don't like being famous, but how I feel is that I don't see myself as that person. It baffles me that people would want a picture with me.
author: Anthony Joshua

quote: I'd be happy if anyone wore my fragrance. They don't have to be famous.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: At 13, I loved how so many of my peers sang and played acoustic guitar, so I started recording videos with covers of famous songs and posting them online.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: If it were just a dream to be famous, then I probably would have died a really quick death, because there is nothing about me that equals fame. I'm not a standup comedian. I don't sing.
author: Viola Davis

quote: When you're poor, you are invisible. Every poor person will tell you nobody sees you. So being famous was me just wanting to be seen.
author: Viola Davis

quote: Sometimes a famous subject may even outlive his own obituary writer.
author: Walter Cronkite

quote: I have no interest in Shakespeare and all that British nonsense... I just wanted to get famous and all the rest is hogwash.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: I turned down many chances to be on TV before 'Pop Idol' because I really wasn't interested in being famous. I didn't need it and didn't want it.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: As communicators and marketers, people are so accustomed to thinking from the 'top down.' Finding the great analyst or the famous journalist who will endorse what you do and tell the rest of the world to go and buy your product.
author: Guy Kawasaki

quote: I've walked with very famous people down red carpets over to the crowd of thousands of people, and you'll reach out to shake their hand and they've got a camera in their hand. And they don't even get their hand out, because they're recording the whole time.
author: George Clooney

quote: I had my Aunt Rosie, who was famous and then not, so I got a lesson in fame early on. And I understood how little it has to do with you. And also how you could use it.
author: George Clooney

quote: I do know something about the news world. I was sitting on the floors of newsrooms since I was seven years old, and I've been around them my whole life. I understand that someone looks at a story with famous people in it, and you want to put it out.
author: George Clooney

quote: I think anyone who is famous is a moron if they're on Twitter. It's just stupid.
author: George Clooney

quote: My great-grandmother was born in London, the daughter of a Brixton coachman, and became the most famous singer in Australia. Her name was Marie Carandini, Madame Carandini.
author: Christopher Lee

quote: You can be famous for a lot of things. You can be a Nobel-prize winner. You can be the fattest guy in the world.
author: Evel Knievel

quote: I know I'm not supposed to have any opinions about politics, because I'm famous.
author: Cher

quote: I've been famous my entire life; I don't know any other way.
author: Cher

quote: I hang out with the right people, my friends that I've had since the beginning. We go to the beach, take walks, paint, see our family - just normal things that people who become famous lose sight of.
author: Kehlani

quote: I've interviewed presidents and royalty, rock stars and movie stars, famous generals and captains of industry; I've had front row seats at Super Bowls, World Series, and Olympic Games; my books have been on best-seller lists, and my marriage is a long-running success.
author: Tom Brokaw

quote: I have had the opportunity to become acquainted with many wonderful people from many walks of life. I have known rich and poor, famous and modest, wise and otherwise.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: I never had a desire to be famous... I was fat. I didn't know any fat famous actresses... You know, once a fat kid, always a fat kid. Because you always think that you just look a little bit wrong or a little bit different from everyone else. And I still sort of have that.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: I was suddenly really famous, and I didn't know how to cope. I didn't know myself well enough as a person, number one, and as an actor, number two. I wanted to escape.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: I know the true meaning of getting by by the skin of my teeth; I do. It doesn't matter whether you've got money or you haven't, whether you're famous or not. This is the case for all women, actually; you have to carry on. You always have to carry on. And you can, because you have to.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: Before 'Titanic,' yes, I had done some things and, yes, I had been nominated for an Academy Award, but I had never been sort of world-famous. And I suppose, yes, I am really famous now. But I feel embarrassed to say that because it's just a bit daft for me.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: When I look back, I am happy that my mum took me to the gymnastics club. I didn't join gymnastics to become a famous athlete or celebrity; it just happened - I did more than I expected, of course.
author: Nadia Comaneci

quote: It's key to become 'famous' for one thing first, and that will give you the credibility to go into other areas once your ready... which generally means a long time and a lot of perfecting!
author: Kevin Plank

quote: Nothing in life prepares you to be famous.
author: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: Whenever you're the child of a famous person, you get judged in odd ways because of that.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: Liverpool people are famous for liking clothes and fashion; they are very social and lively people, and we know that they like clothes.
author: Vivienne Westwood

quote: It wasn't easy navigating publicity when I started, because I grew up with 'being famous,' and I'm just not into it, and I guess defensiveness gets read into that. And I didn't get an easy ride at the beginning.
author: Stella McCartney

quote: I never dreamt of being a musician for my livelihood. I certainly never would have wanted to be in the business that I'm in, meaning the fame and the glory, the glitter, the rock star, the famous part.
author: Eddie Van Halen

quote: The problem is, the more famous you get, the more people see you who didn't choose to.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: Whereas you have someone like Houdini, who works really, really hard to get really, really famous, and then has actual intellectual ideas that he puts into the culture that stay there.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: My mother always, always, always thought that I was going to be famous. Thought that I was going to win Oscars. In fact, I believe I accepted the Oscar as a ketchup bottle many a time in front of my mother in the kitchen. 'I'd like to thank the Academy,' I said with a ketchup bottle.
author: Kevin Spacey

quote: What I've said before, only half in joke, is that everybody in Ireland is famous. Or, maybe better, say everybody is familiar.
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: Wanting to be an actor and wanting to be famous are different.
author: Blake Lively

quote: Nobody prepares you for what happens when you get famous, and I didn't handle it well.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: I absolutely loved being famous. It was all great, up until the point when it wasn't.
author: Noel Gallagher

quote: Anything that's of any use, famous people get hold of it and take it for themselves and it gets a bad rap.
author: Noel Gallagher

quote: I never wanted to be a celebrity; I never wanted to be famous. And in my daily life, I work really hard to not trade on it in any way.
author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quote: I'm glad that my parents missed one thing that was really unbelievable. They saw me hit this great success. It was a blast and we had a lot of laughs. And it was just an amazing time. They passed away. And then after I got, you know, famous, all these haters came out of nowhere.
author: Dane Cook

quote: I'm a regular person. I know a lot of people love being famous. I don't like it. I'm just chillin'. YouknowwhatI'msayin'?
author: Wale

quote: I grew up in the limelight and being the child of someone famous. So my relationship with fame is not bedazzled.
author: Lupita Nyong'o

quote: Our country was not built to support blood dynasties or to elevate the rich and famous to a higher ethical or constitutional plain.
author: Andrew Breitbart

quote: I had no desire to be famous; I just wanted to make the greatest music ever made. I didn't want anyone to know who I was.
author: Robert Smith

quote: io9 was the last standalone site that Gawker Media ever launched. It was born at a time when many of the company's other famous sites, from Consumerist and Wonkette to Fleshbot and Idolator, were being sold off or shuttered.
author: Annalee Newitz

quote: I have a great job writing for 'The Office,' but, really, all television writers do is dream of one day writing movies. I'll put it this way: At the Oscars the most famous person in the room is, like, Angelina Jolie. At the Emmys the huge exciting celebrity is Bethenny Frankel. You get what I mean.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: When I first became famous, I didn't know if I could go where I wanted to because I didn't know how people were going to act. Some folks would scream and holler, and I didn't know what to do with that.
author: Jill Scott

quote: After a fellow gets famous it doesn't take long for someone to bob up that used to sit by him in school.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: I bemoan the fact that all my famous friends have places in St. Bart's and I have to go to Montauk.
author: Rufus Wainwright

quote: Luckily, I think, I never really wanted to be famous, I just wanted to make movies.
author: Seth Rogen

quote: I remember, when I was an up-and-coming comic, how annoyed I would be when the famous guys would show up and just take everyone's spots.
author: Seth Rogen

quote: The good thing about L.A. is that there's always someone more famous 100 yards away from me.
author: Seth Rogen

quote: The dream of any scholar has, for me, come true by virtue of this award. The Nobel Prizes are justly famous in the hard sciences, in literature, and for peace.
author: Paul Samuelson

quote: The first time I went to Johnny Depp's house in LA is when I realized what I was getting myself into. I knew he was famous, but I didn't really know what that entailed.
author: Kate Moss

quote: I'm fortunate to be famous for two rather imposing characters like Magneto and Gandalf.
author: Ian Mckellen

quote: The strength of British theatre should be that these actors in their middle years know what they're doing and are good at it. Not rich, not famous, but making a living.
author: Ian Mckellen

quote: I'd never read 'Lord of the Rings' until I was asked to play Gandalf, so I didn't really know it was a frightfully famous book.
author: Ian Mckellen

quote: There has been a time on earth when poets had been young and dead and famous - and were men. But now the poet as the tragic child of grandeur and destiny had changed. The child of genius was a woman, now, and the man was gone.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: When I was going for my graduate degree, I decided I was going to make a feature film as my thesis. That's what I was famous for-that I had my thesis film be a feature film, which was 'You're a Big Boy Now.'
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: I certainly don't think you need to be famous to want to leave a legacy, but when you are famous, it's even more likely that your child will get the wrong perspective on your life if you die prematurely.
author: Shania Twain

quote: There is a misleading, unwritten rule that states if a quote giving advice comes from someone famous, very old, or Greek, then it must be good advice.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: If you think Abraham Lincoln became famous for inventing the town car, it is time to spend a few hours on history.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: I'm English. Our dentistry is not world famous.
author: Christian Bale

quote: You have to pretend that your life is a financial pleasure even when your autographs are bouncing.
author: Kinky Friedman

quote: I'm doing a new musical on Broadway, which opens in October called 'The Boy from Oz,' where I play Peter Allen. For those of you who don't know, he became first famous in America for marrying Liza Minelli.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: Forget about being world famous, it's hard enough just getting the automatic doors at the supermarket to acknowledge our existence.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: A famous love story is hard to maintain when you both live in the spotlight.
author: Lauren Bacall

quote: Sometimes I think that when people become famous, there's a public perception that they are not human beings any more. They don't have feelings; they don't get hurt; you can act and say as you like about them.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: I would love to do a biopic of a famous singer, like Diana Ross or Donna Summer, or an old jazz story that we haven't seen before. I would love to do that! I would love to play Diana Ross 'cause she's an icon. I'm salivating to do that.
author: Taraji P. Henson

quote: One of the interesting things about Twitter is looking how famous people choose to use it. Take someone like Steve Martin, who I follow: it's all sorts of comic gems, nothing private, nothing personal - all jokes. Other celebrities are overtly personal - like Charlie Sheen. I do a mix of observations and updates.
author: Rob Lowe

quote: When I was starting out, I thought I would go into comedy and there would be a mentor, like the Philip Seymour Hoffman character in 'Almost Famous,' in my life, and there just wasn't. It was really frustrating for me because I desired that so much.
author: Mike Birbiglia

quote: I did not want to write one of those sequels that famous first-book authors get into where everybody says, 'Oh yeah.'
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: I never pursued being 'famous.'
author: Francesca Annis

quote: Exposure makes you famous, not just good work. Famous is being plastered everywhere.
author: Francesca Annis

quote: I liked myself much more before I got famous. I was much friendlier and had more energy.
author: Sia

quote: When I was 10, my parents really valued success in the arts, and I thought if I was a famous 'something artistic,' that they would love me more.
author: Sia

quote: I appreciate my music is famous, but I'd rather my face wasn't so that I can just live a normal life.
author: Sia

quote: I got a little bit famous. I didn't like it.
author: Sia

quote: I don't want to be famous or recognizable. I don't want to be critiqued about the way that I look on the Internet... I've been writing pop songs for pop stars for a couple years and see what their lives are like, and that's just not something I want.
author: Sia

quote: I don't really even go out that much now, except to walk my dogs, because I don't want to be recognised. I used to be a really friendly person, and now I just want to be invisible. I liked myself much more before I got famous. I was much friendlier and had more energy.
author: Sia

quote: Vine is where 'Don't' started popping off. A lot of famous Viners used the song, and that was crazy because I had never been a part of something like that. I drank champagne for the first time when it got 100,000 plays.
author: Bryson Tiller

quote: You can get rich or famous by doing the same thing.
author: Ang Lee

quote: You can't date if you're famous. That's how it seems to me.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: It's interesting because people assume that because I'm famous I know all famous people.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: There were a few years there when I was just so enamored with the idea of living some sort of famous person's lifestyle that really isn't suited to me.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: I think it's useful, as a famous person, to have as little separation between the perception of you and how you really are - because otherwise I'd be sitting here thinking I'm keeping secrets, and wondering when you're going to find out.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: As a famous person you think how you're gonna end it, get away and have a normal life.
author: Gwen Stefani

quote: The whole 'American Idol' way of looking at things is the antithesis of what I grew up with. There are a whole lot of kids wanting to be famous now, whereas if I'd even mentioned that word to one of my teachers, I would have got into a whole load of trouble.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: I wanted to be famous. I wanted people to talk about me.
author: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: I don't know the literary world; I was scared of being confronted with famous names, not knowing what they had written. It was occupied territory I was entering.
author: John le Carre

quote: I don't want to end up being a circus act, doing my most famous tricks when I'm 70.
author: Pharrell Williams

quote: If people just want to be famous, that's just not enough to get you up at 4 in the morning to go to work. You have to love what you're doing.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: When I got into the music industry, I wasn't focused on being the most famous artist or even getting a major record deal. It was just to make music on my own terms or create my own image, do my own hair, do my own makeup.
author: Janelle Monae

quote: I became famous, I think, really because of the interpretation of other people's songs, way back when, and that's what I enjoy the most. And I'm a lazy bugger.
author: Rod Stewart

quote: Even though I am fortunate to have certain luxuries, sometimes, I am even amazed by what people with money have and do. I want to remind people that just because you might be rich and famous, it doesn't mean you have to take yourself too seriously.
author: Nick Cannon

quote: The fire in the belly is essential, otherwise you become Michael Buble - famous and meaningless.
author: Morrissey

quote: I fell in love with a civilian. Not an actress and not a famous actress at that. Because then the attention doesn't double - it grows exponentially. Because then suddenly everybody wants to be in your bedroom. But I don't really give them anything.
author: Matt Damon

quote: Before I became famous I had a very full life, and that gave me a lot to pick from. I always use everything. It always comes in handy. Working with animals... Well, I just enjoyed that. That was the most peaceful time.
author: Cyndi Lauper

quote: Famous doesn't mean anything. Just because people know my face doesn't mean they know us or that it makes us any more interesting or better.
author: Melissa McCarthy

quote: Famous people come up to me, but I don't know who they are because my sight is so bad. It's always at the pool of the Four Seasons in Beverly Hills when I don't have my lenses in and my glasses are in my room.
author: Helena Bonham Carter

quote: I'm just a guy who happens to work in public from time to time. I've built a reputation as an established comic, not as a celebrity - a celebrity is someone who is famous but doesn't do anything.
author: Dylan Moran

quote: Have I ever been to a party with a ton of famous people in it? Yes, several times, so I guess that's a Hollywood lifestyle.
author: Michael Keaton

quote: It's great to make your own choices, but there's a price to pay. I could've made more money or been more famous. I could be the current groovy guy.
author: Michael Keaton

quote: I was famous in our college for calm and impassionate discussion; for one whole summer, I rose at five and went to bed at midnight, that I might have sufficient time for theology and metaphysics.
author: William Godwin

quote: I really don't know anything else because my brothers were famous when I was two years old. So I know nothing else, no other life.
author: Janet Jackson

quote: When you become a celebrity, the world owns you and your image.
author: Megan Fox

quote: People just assume that if you're famous, you're in Hollywood.
author: Megan Fox

quote: I want people to know me through the movies I do. I want to be judged on that. If you start becoming famous for your personal life, that's when your career goes away.
author: Megan Fox

quote: I don't think about being famous, really. Being an author, I don't generally get stopped as I walk down the street. It's not like being a movie star.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: I'd love to live in Ireland but I'd like to live as me, not what someone thinks I am. People don't understand - I lived there before I was famous.
author: Van Morrison

quote: Being famous was extremely disappointing for me. When I became famous it was a complete drag and it is still a complete drag.
author: Van Morrison

quote: I have an ambition to write a great book, but that's really a competition with myself. I've noticed that a lot of young writers, people in all media, want to be famous but they don't really want to do anything. I can't think of anything less worth striving for than fame.
author: Zadie Smith

quote: Maybe Elvis was inhibited by inbred religious prohibitions or an Oedipal complex, or maybe he simply preferred the thrill of a denied release. Whatever put the brakes on the famous pelvis, it ground to a halt at a certain point, and that was it.
author: Rita Moreno

quote: You just feel like you're doing a job that you want to be doing, and then one day, somebody asks you a question like that: 'What's it like to be famous?' It doesn't really mean anything. The only difference is some people stop you and ask you for photographs.
author: Hozier

quote: Evictions used to be rare in this country. They used to draw crowds. There are scenes in literature where you can come upon an eviction - like, in 'Invisible Man' there's the famous eviction scene in Harlem, and people are gathered around, and they move the family back in.
author: Matthew Desmond

quote: I don't want to create controversy; I just have an opinion on things, and there is nothing wrong with stating your opinion if you are asked. Everyone wants that right, and because you are famous doesn't mean you have less of a right.
author: John Travolta

quote: When a place advertises itself as 'World Famous,' you may be sure it isn't.
author: Herb Caen

quote: People hate me because I am a multifaceted, talented, wealthy, internationally famous genius.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: I loved cowboy films and TV series, and I learned bits of English from them. My favorite was 'Laramie', with Robert Fuller and John Smith. I used to watch 'The Lone Ranger', which had been famous in Japan as well. I idolized these cowboys.
author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quote: Fame necessarily isn't really tied to success at all. Fame is just being recognized for doing what you do, whether it's good or bad. Osama bin Laden was famous.
author: Big Sean

quote: If you're doing this because you feel like you have a burning desire to do it, then you'll find a way to do it, no matter what. If you're doing this because you're thinking, 'Hey, this will be really cool. I'll be famous. I'll be on YouTube,' then you'll probably quit, because it's not easy to do for the long haul.
author: Trisha Yearwood

quote: I was very dramatic - very, like, 'It's never going to happen. My life is over at 16 because I'm not already famous. I'm not going to get my record deal. I'm not going to be able to sing for a living.'
author: Trisha Yearwood

quote: It's not the job of the art to accommodate me and make me more money, make me more famous and get me more girls.
author: Mike Posner

quote: I remember I wanted to be an athlete. I wanted to be in the NFL or NBA or something, and I don't think I dreamed of being a benchwarmer. I'm sure I wanted to be the best. But I didn't really ever think I was going to be a famous musician.
author: Mike Posner

quote: I wanted to be the most famous. And it wasn't until I hung out with Justin Bieber that the whole thing got demystified. The mystique of it was gone.
author: Mike Posner

quote: Well I would say that we're regular people first of all and we're normal and it's obvious by some of the things that have happened just because our name is famous we're not immune to tragedy.
author: Brett Favre

quote: I love the urban comedies, because they keep you famous, keep you having fun, and keep you in love with the business. Those are my roots. I'll always love doing those.
author: Terry Crews

quote: It wasn't until after I became famous that people noticed I played in the NFL. I kind of snuck in!
author: Terry Crews

quote: The sound of my voice is more famous than me.
author: Jimmy Iovine

quote: It doesn't matter what famous person I've come across in the street, I don't think I've ever shouted.
author: Lewis Hamilton

quote: I love what I do for a living, but the other side, that aspect of being famous or a celebrity's got zero interest to me.
author: Jeffrey Dean Morgan

quote: Luckily, I don't think that I'm too famous. I can still live my life pretty comfortably. Fame has never really ever appealed to me. I think it's easy to see that it's not a great thing to have.
author: Tig Notaro

quote: Tom Cruise, he's a lot more famous than me.
author: David Beckham

quote: On an emotional level, success in America would be terrible for me; it would be insane. I really, seriously, never want to be famous here.
author: Robbie Williams

quote: I have only one ambition, which is to be famous.
author: Robbie Williams

quote: It's famous that comedians have a very dark personal state of mind. I think, in my case, it's the same. The only way to get deep is to have a balance, or a counterbalance.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: What is so weird is that young people who want to be 'celebrities' do not want to put in the hard work. They don't want to do the training, go to drama school, read Shakespeare, try different accents and study technique. They just want to be famous. It is not just in England; it's the same in America and all over Europe.
author: Joan Collins

quote: I didn't get into writing to make money or get famous or any of that. I got into it to hit hearts, and man, when I get letters not just from the soldiers but from their kids, especially their kids, it makes it all worthwhile.
author: Tim O'Brien

quote: When you're really famous, there's very little authenticity in people, so you prefer the company of children.
author: Katherine Ryan

quote: I would have been very happy just working from job to job, paying my rent one movie at a time. I never wanted to be this famous. I never imagined this life for myself.
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: I never wanted to be the most famous, the most beautiful, the most extravagant.
author: Manolo Blahnik

quote: Being famous is just like being in high school. But I'm not interested in being the cheerleader. I'm not interested in being Gwen Stefani. She's the cheerleader, and I'm out in the smoker shed.
author: Courtney Love

quote: Apart from its famous healing properties, manuka has a strong, woody flavour.
author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quote: It's part of the celebrity process but my life has never been as interesting or as wild as what's been printed about me.
author: Winona Ryder

quote: I'm an active participation guy. No matter how much money you make, no matter how famous you are, you're not above going outside and cutting trees. I do it all the time.
author: Bill Goldberg

quote: No matter how much money you make, no matter how famous you are, you're not above going outside and cutting trees. I do it all the time.
author: Bill Goldberg

quote: I didn't even listen to any music until I was 19, really. I just wanted to be famous. But I didn't say it to anyone because I was really embarrassed at the thought.
author: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: Hitler was so modern, in that he was obsessed with being famous. He was caught up with this rush to be have achieved greatness before turning 30.
author: John Cusack

quote: None of my characters are rich or famous, and the situations they find themselves in could happen to anyone.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: I'd always need a creative outlet. But sometimes, I do fantasize what my life would be like if I weren't famous.
author: Jodie Foster

quote: My father always had people around the house who were famous psychics.
author: Natalie Massenet

quote: Those who have known the famous are publicly debriefed of their memories, knowing as their own dusk falls that they will only be remembered for remembering someone else.
author: Alan Bennett

quote: Britain is famous for being great at inventing and poor at commercializing.
author: Margaret Heffernan

quote: Exploitation films were famous for taking an issue an exploiting it because they could move much faster than a studio could. If there was any hot topic, they would run out and make a quick movie and make a buck on it, by changing it around and using it, in some way, to give some relevance.
author: Robert Rodriguez

quote: You want a hero in the music world? James Brown. He brought a feeling to music without really using words. He's just famous for his sound.
author: David Lee Roth

quote: I earned my famous name.
author: Brian Wilson

quote: Indian paper is famous, Egyptian papyrus, Chinese paper... every country has used this natural material. But the problem is it's going to run out because it's very difficult work.
author: Issey Miyake

quote: I thought the more famous I became, the more friendships I would have, but the opposite was true.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: I have a profound empathy for people who are in the public eye, whether they manifest it themselves or whether it happened by accident - it doesn't matter to me. I think there's a great misunderstanding of what it is to be famous.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Only traumatised people want to be famous.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Know the names of past and current artists who are most famous for playing their instruments.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: The most famous and one of the most thoroughgoing opponents of bank credit was Thomas Jefferson. Jefferson reacted to the panic of 1819 as a confirmation of his pessimistic views on banks.
author: Murray Rothbard

quote: There are high spots in all of our lives and most of them have come about through encouragement from someone else. I don't care how great, how famous or successful a man or woman may be, each hungers for applause.
author: George Matthew Adams

quote: I'm coming out with a wine... I'm actually a restaurateur. I have Famous Famiglia Pizzeria that has opened up in the Sacramento airport. I'm also working with my business partner on opening up the Linnethia Lounge.
author: NeNe Leakes

quote: You're not famous until my mother has heard of you.
author: Jay Leno

quote: You aren't famous until my mother has heard of you.
author: Jay Leno

quote: For me a Writing Day was an occasion for self-reproach and panic, a time to lament the passing of the years, stare out of windows and remember that even those famous late starters Joseph Conrad and George Eliot had started by the age I was now.
author: Howard Jacobson

quote: I was famous overnight. I went from nowhere to being really big.
author: Sting

quote: There is a famous saying: 'It's hard to be a Jew.' It's also hard to be a Palestinian. I know that.
author: Ariel Sharon

quote: You have to be realistic. I'd love to be more famous, have lots of people supporting me, people knowing my name, but I need a tennis racket or a golf club or to play football. Being a female, I don't stand a chance.
author: Victoria Pendleton

quote: When you see a fantastic colour or cut in a magazine, perched up on some famous so-and-so's head, it's tempting to ask your stylist for the same, but do not be fooled. The hair in those fancy photos can be very high maintenance.
author: Beth Ditto

quote: I don't feel famous and I didn't want my autobiography to be like a Paris Hilton story.
author: Beth Ditto

quote: Bruce Lee was very famous. I watched his movies and he is amazing. He is a martial arts master, his philosophy, his movement, both physically and mentally, were very strong.
author: Jet Li

quote: I wanted to be famous. It's embarrassing to admit, but I came out to L.A. thinking it would happen in no time. I thought, 'Once they see me, they'll be so glad I came.' I always had a ridiculous amount of self-confidence about what was going to happen to me.
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: No one can train you to be famous. How do you deal with the loss of anonymity, the loss of privacy? You have to be disciplined.
author: Wesley Snipes

quote: The first syndicating I tried was when two partners and I created a production company in 1952. We wanted to syndicate famous Bible stories and sell them for $25 a show.
author: Casey Kasem

quote: Whenever someone says to my mum: 'How's your son doing?' she says: 'Which one?' If you're a parent, you're not going to go: 'Oh I'll concentrate on the famous one.'
author: Martin Freeman

quote: Public scandals are America's favorite parlor sport. Learning about the flaws and misdeeds of the rich and famous seems to satisfy our egalitarian yearnings.
author: Robert Dallek

quote: Famous is celebrityism, and I don't want that... I know that I'm not that. Everybody knows who you are. I can't imagine living that life, but I don't think I consider myself famous.
author: Robin Wright

quote: 'Swallow My Gift' is all about music being its own reward. I don't do it to become more famous; I don't do it to make money. I don't do it from an ego-driven point of view.
author: Russell Crowe

quote: I want to eat, cook, meet famous people and make fun of them.
author: Roseanne Barr

quote: The more they applaud, the bigger your salary will be.
author: Anna Held

quote: I got sick of being famous. It is not a desirable 'job.'
author: Amanda de Cadenet

quote: Life is going to happen to you no matter what weight you are, no matter how famous you are, no matter how much money you have in the bank. No one gets a free pass.
author: Amanda de Cadenet

quote: Getting recognized on the street is fine, but I never really wanted to be famous.
author: Kate McKinnon

quote: Getting recognized on the street is fine, but I never really wanted to be famous. I just wanted to have mastered the art of sketch comedy.
author: Kate McKinnon

quote: I used to be like everyone else and think the Kardashians are just famous for being famous. But I've been really impressed with how supportive Kim Kardashian has been of Caitlyn Jenner.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: I've had offers that could've made me much richer and much more famous than I am.
author: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: I could have been a lot more famous and played leading men and everything. For whatever reason, I didn't go for it.
author: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: Fame in itself is, you know... It involves a whole discussion on just that word, 'fame.' It's a power; it's another degree of power, to be famous. I think it's obvious: you have more influence the more well-known you are. And, hopefully, it's righteously used.
author: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: The first pork-barrel bill that crosses my desk, I'm going to veto it and make the authors of those pork-barrel items famous all over America.
author: John McCain

quote: Everyone wants to be famous; so do I. But I cannot lose sleep over it.
author: Randeep Hooda

quote: A lot of people these days are not music lovers - they just want to be famous which is a very different thing to what I grew up believing in.
author: Shirley Manson

quote: Acting-wise, I love Helena Bonham Carter. I love Kate Winslet. I love Angelina Jolie when she was 'Girl, Interrupted' Angelina Jolie. There isn't anybody that I can definitely point to and be like her. Because I've never felt like I've been able to relate to the women that are famous.
author: Jessica Williams

quote: Fame is a thing that happens when you do something you love - nobody wants to be famous for the wrong reasons. It's not my goal, but if being more famous means I can get more music out, that's cool.
author: Tyga

quote: When I did 'Percy Jackson,' people told me, 'Oh, you're going to be so famous... you're not going to be able to walk down the street... it's going to be huge,' and it wasn't - although it was big for my career.
author: Alexandra Daddario

quote: I think I was lucky to be a little older when I became famous. But still, the shock of the world starting to treat you in a weird way... I had come from the army, where we had to deal with life or death, and suddenly, people were asking whether you were cool or not. I have never cared about whether I'm cool.
author: James Blunt

quote: I was a shy kid, but somehow I knew I would make it as a performer. I'd always be telling my mum that I was going to be a famous singer. In my school yearbooks I would write, 'Remember me when I'm famous.' I knew I had a gift.
author: Nicole Scherzinger

quote: The family is very important. They make me feel good always because if I won, when I started to be famous, the relationship never changed with my friends and family.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: Fame is a lot of pressure, especially when you're responsible for your entire family. Financially, emotionally - everything.
author: Nick Carter

quote: I used to send away for eight-minute Super 8 movies of various Ray Harryhausen scenes advertised on the back of 'Famous Monsters of Filmland' magazine.
author: Peter Jackson

quote: 'Heavenly Creatures' was really the idea of Fran Walsh. It was a very famous New Zealand murder case, but not one that people knew much about.
author: Peter Jackson

quote: There are loads of actresses that modelled. They just weren't famous. There weren't a lot that were really known as models that became actresses, but there are hordes of them that did modelling before such as Anjelica Huston, Jessica Lange, Sharon Stone, Demi Moore and Geena Davis. There are loads of 'em.
author: Andie MacDowell

quote: People enjoy making fun of people who are famous; they love putting people down.
author: Lee Daniels

quote: I'm always so amazed by which performances work really, really well and which ones don't. But I think it's just mostly, 'She's Out Of My League,' so many people saw that movie on DVD and on the plane. Just millions of people saw that movie. That's the reason I'm somewhat famous.
author: T. J. Miller

quote: To be a Southern Ground artist, you have to be a lifer. It's not about winning a karaoke contest or a television show to become famous. It's about really paying your dues. It's people I'm fans of and want to help in the business.
author: Zac Brown

quote: When you look at Michael Jackson, there's nobody who loves him in that family, nobody. If they did, they'd tell him he didn't have to do all that in order to be famous. All he has to do is keep doing his music and be himself. Michael's been a little touched for about 20 years, but somebody needs to pull him aside and tell him they love him.
author: Jamie Foxx

quote: I have a very down-to-earth father. My wife is an actress and famous herself is more down-to-earth than anyone I know.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: By no means do I try to go out and hang out with famous people.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: I'm somebody who likes to gravitate toward people who aren't necessarily famous.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: Marx and Engels are arguably history's most famous couple. Such was the closeness of their collaboration that it is not always easy to recall which works bore both names, which just that of Marx, and which just Engels.
author: Martin Jacques

quote: A lot of times on tour it's about, 'OK, where am I today? Wow, I'm in Costa Rica. What is their famous dish?' And it's about trying the food, and really experiencing it.
author: Fergie

quote: I wanted so badly to be in a famous band, and it was not happening. I played drums with different bands and with the Blue Man Group in Chicago, but I definitely felt like, 'Wow, I did not picture my life being like this.'
author: Fred Armisen

quote: Temptation's something you have to deal with even if you're not famous. It's harder when you're famous because it's a lot more in your face, and that makes it a little more difficult to walk away from sometimes.
author: Denis Leary

quote: I learned a long time ago, if you want to keep your friends in show business, don't get famous. Because as soon as you get famous, a lot of the people you used to know, who didn't, become incredibly bitter and jealous. It's part of the territory.
author: Denis Leary

quote: I think that most people who are just artists, who are getting famous, would trade a lot of their fame back for some normalcy, pretty much immediately.
author: Ansel Elgort

quote: For now I'm just enjoying being a mom. I don't want to be more famous and more rich. I want to be a good mom.
author: Jewel

quote: My family was musical on both sides. My father's family had a famous flautist and a classical pianist. My mother won a contest to be Shirley Temple's double - she was the diva of the family. At 8, I learned how to play guitar. I used to play songs from the '20s, '30s and '40s in the kitchen for my grandmother.
author: Gloria Estefan

quote: Some people want fame, popularity and huge sales. I've always hoped to have a really long career. So I've tried to make each of my creative decisions and business decisions to allow for longevity. As a side effect I got really famous and really big. I didn't realize the two could go together.
author: Jewel

quote: A few of the world's most famous non-American novelists have large followings in the United States, among them Gabriel Garcia Marquez and Guenter Grass, who were both popular even before winning the Nobel.
author: Stephen Kinzer

quote: Most famous stage actors tactfully fade away.
author: Robert Gottlieb

quote: Despite the rigid classicism of the famous Paris Opera school and company, the French have done more than their share to unmoor la Danse from its traditions and standards.
author: Robert Gottlieb

quote: Sometimes I dream to be alone and that nobody would talk to me. But I understand that football is really important and that everybody watches it. When you're famous, you have to do photos or autographs, especially for the kids.
author: Mario Balotelli

quote: I like celebrities. I love people who are famous. Always have.
author: Elaine Stritch

quote: That's what we were exploring on 'Larry Sanders' - the human qualities that have brought us to where we are now in the world: the addiction to needing more and wanting more and talking more. We were examining the labels put on success - is it successful to be on TV every day, to be famous, to have a paycheck?
author: Garry Shandling

quote: Celebrities and 'famous' people are just regular folks. I know, it's a shocking and potentially dangerous statement.
author: Adam McKay

quote: Ultimately, the only people who are in any way edified by hanging with famous people are you at the age of 11 and your mom.
author: Adam McKay

quote: I didn't get into skating to be famous.
author: Eric Heiden

quote: It's not a sport you get famous at. If I wanted to be famous, I would have stuck with hockey.
author: Eric Heiden

quote: You don't knock television, even if you don't always like what they make of your work. It makes all the difference between being an also-ran writer and very famous.
author: Ruth Rendell

quote: 'Ali' offers stunning re-creations of bouts Ali fought. In the second Liston fight, the auditorium is underlighted and clouded with fetid cigar smoke, which was why the famous picture of a snarling Ali standing over Liston was so dramatic; indoor arenas are now bright enough to be spotted from Alpha Centauri.
author: Elvis Mitchell

quote: The idea of being famous is a lot better than the reality.
author: Tom Felton

quote: It is ridiculous - like a mad whirlwind... it's mad that I'm so famous.
author: Amy Jackson

quote: To put it simply - you know, a lot of people believe that the benefit of this job is fame and fortune. I believe that you pay for the fortune through the fame. I don't buy into the notion that being famous is somehow a good thing, or an exciting thing, or a wonderful thing.
author: Evangeline Lilly

quote: You can talk to someone relatively famous, and they say, 'What do you do? What do you do for a job?' and I say, 'I make documentaries for the BBC,' and you see their eyes just glaze over.
author: Louis Theroux

quote: What I do is what I like; if I'm not as famous as I'd like to be, I've done it to myself.
author: Blake Shelton

quote: Most of what Hawaii has to offer is no secret. Pipeline is probably the most famous wave in the world.
author: Kelly Slater

quote: Famous people complain about fame, but they never want to give it back, myself included.
author: Erica Jong

quote: Barack Obama hopes his famous health care victory will mark him as a transformative president. History, however, may judge it to have been his missed opportunity to be one.
author: George Will

quote: I wanted to go hide. I wasn't looking to be more famous, I'm famous enough.
author: Howard Stern

quote: The whole celebrity culture thing - I'm fascinated by, and repelled by, and yet I end up knowing about it.
author: Anderson Cooper

quote: Being famous gets me good concert tickets, good tables in restaurants, good seats at sporting events and that's really about it.
author: Fran Drescher

quote: I think Dutch people are very sober. I don't know if it's the right word. Like, you have the most famous person walk by some Dutch people, and they're like, 'Oh, hello.' And they maybe take a photo, but most of the time, they'll respect you and leave you alone. And if you go to some other countries they will literally mob you, go crazy.
author: Martin Garrix

quote: The poster boy for our superabled future is Oscar Pistorius, an increasingly famous South African sprinter who happens to have had both of his legs amputated below the knee. Using upside down question mark-shaped carbon fiber sprinting prosthetics, called Cheetah blades, Mr. Pistorius can challenge the fastest sprinters in the world.
author: Daniel H. Wilson

quote: Quite often I can be in a bookshop, standing beneath a great big picture of myself and paying for a book with a credit card clearly marked John Grisham, yet no one recognises me. I often say I'm a famous author in a country where no one reads.
author: John Grisham

quote: There's a definite responsibility that comes with being famous. You shouldn't be able to just dress up and look pretty.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: I have to say, you know, I've seen so many people go through the cycle and become famous and not famous anymore and, you know, want - have their priorities change and want different things.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: Superhero movies are so famous because of the metaphor that they trigger in one's self about who you could be if things were different.
author: Patty Jenkins

quote: I partied in every capital in Europe, basked on all the famous beaches, and good-timed it in South America, the South Seas, the Orient, and the more palatable portions of Africa.
author: Frank Abagnale

quote: I just love the weather. I live on Miami Beach, which is all boutique hotels and cocktails. I do sometimes go along to smart parties in my white suit, but I wouldn't really recognise any famous people if they were there because I'm not very good at star-spotting.
author: Irvine Welsh

quote: If you're famous, you suck, just for being famous. People in England totally get that; Americans don't.
author: Trey Parker

quote: Any idiot can get laid when they're famous. That's easy. It's getting laid when you're not famous that takes some talent.
author: Kevin Bacon

quote: My dad was an architect, and he wasn't a rich guy, but in our little world in Philadelphia, he was famous. He loved to see his picture in the paper. I wanted to be more famous than him.
author: Kevin Bacon

quote: There are two types of actors: those who say they don't want to be famous, and those who are liars.
author: Kevin Bacon

quote: Show me an actor who doesn't want to be famous, and I'll show you a liar. Later, you realise that there's more to it than just the acquisition of fame, and money and girls. But that is what drives them and was what drove me, initially.
author: Kevin Bacon

quote: One of the top comments I get from people is, 'Oh my God, you're like a regular person!' That's kind of a bizarre thing to live with. I know a lot of famous people, and their lives may not be regular, but they are regular people.
author: Kevin Bacon

quote: I wasn't going off to New York to be more famous than my father, but in retrospect, that certainly was driving me. He was famous in Philadelphia, but it was also really important to him to be famous. And to a certain extent, I got some of that, even though there were parts of it that horrified me.
author: Kevin Bacon

quote: I was never that famous, but I do think going to college and really getting away from the business and taking a true break is incredibly, incredibly important if you start acting at a young age.
author: Gaby Hoffmann

quote: I was never as famous as all these kids. There was no social media. We weren't celebrity-obsessed as a culture. I feel like these kids are under a crazy microscope; they're basically brands. And they eventually implode and act out. They need a break, and they're not getting one.
author: Gaby Hoffmann

quote: Television has filled the space for actors that really want to make good work and not just make a lot of money and be famous for making a lot of money and being famous.
author: Gaby Hoffmann

quote: I'm hardly the most notable person in 'Zombieland.' The other actors in it are way more famous than I am.
author: Jesse Eisenberg

quote: I meet people who are in movies, and the stuff that they write is terrible, but nobody tells them that because they're famous. So I worry that my stuff might be like that, too.
author: Jesse Eisenberg

quote: Kids will ask us 'How do you become famous?' It's the wrong question. Focus on the craft, not on the fame.
author: Isaac Hanson

quote: I guess some people want to be performers because they want to be famous.
author: Jenny Slate

quote: The rich and famous expect to get a lot for their story, whether they are writing it themselves or not. It's not that they need the money, of course; it's a question of ego, like catching the biggest fish.
author: Michael Korda

quote: Of course the rich and famous tend to have more going on in their lives than ordinary people, but they aren't always willing to tell the interesting bits.
author: Michael Korda

quote: Peter Fleming was a famous English traveler, explorer and adventurer, whose non-fiction books were hugely successful. My father owned signed copies of all of them - he and Peter Fleming had become acquainted over some detail of set design at the Korda film studio in Shepperton - and I had read each of them with breathless adolescent excitement.
author: Michael Korda

quote: It's my observation that gardeners and gardening for a very long time have had to take a back seat. Architects are very famous; they've got huge projects. What goes on in and around them has been relegated to a very minor role.
author: Robert Irwin

quote: When people stare at you, and you read about yourself in papers - at 13, it just got very confusing. I thought that if this is what it's like to be famous, I don't like it one bit.
author: Alexander Skarsgard

quote: I have some idea of the pressure of finding your own identity with a famous father.
author: Michael Douglas

quote: I don't want to be famous as a movie star and have the whole world love me, I want to be a creative actress.
author: Juliette Lewis

quote: When you become famous at 19, it does a number in your head, so you find romance in the mundane - isn't it so great that a guy would pick me up at my house and take me to a restaurant?
author: Juliette Lewis

quote: I've never really cared if I was famous for my music. It was just something I had to do.
author: Juliette Lewis

quote: I've played with some very famous bandits in my time on the celebrity golf circuit.
author: Jasper Carrott

quote: To enjoy being famous, you need to have a screw loose.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: You know, I did not like being famous. It was a stressful and ugly time, and I'm glad it's over.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: Everywhere you look, especially on TV, someone is promising to make you rich and famous.
author: Diego Luna

quote: We're teaching young girls that this is what they should be focusing on: rich and famous girls who are rich and famous for nothing.
author: Ellen Pompeo

quote: Fame was never something I was seeking in my artistic journey. It's to be used as a tool for an artist to break open doors and keep creating. That's how I enjoyed fame in '74; it was not just for the emptiness of being famous.
author: Philippe Petit

quote: Everybody wanted me to be rich and famous on my art. And I said no to all the commercials and all the seedy offers.
author: Philippe Petit

quote: I think people should be protected from being made to feel that they want to know what somebody famous had for breakfast.
author: John Hurt

quote: When our daughter was born, a light went on for me - there was more to life than what I was doing. It felt like being famous for being a paint salesman. It wasn't the dream I was sold on. I'd had enough of it.
author: Rick Astley

quote: Everything I achieve affects my family as well, and suddenly, my kids' dad became the most famous man in the country for a couple of weeks.
author: Bradley Wiggins

quote: I don't ever want to be famous. I never want to live that life. I genuinely hate the fact that I would be stopped for a picture or an autograph all the time.
author: Charlotte Dujardin

quote: That's why success hasn't changed me: because I don't want to be famous or do TV or be a model or be recognised in a shop. I'm not interested. There's nothing worse.
author: Charlotte Dujardin

quote: I know somebody from university who's called Phil Collins, and I think there's something terribly unfortunate about sharing a name with somebody who either is famous or becomes famous.
author: David Walliams

quote: I've noticed that once you leave London you do kind of become a bit more famous. People in London are a bit too cool for school. It's not so unusual to see someone from London in the street. But outside of London people are a bit more excited to see you and come out and support you.
author: David Walliams

quote: My name is not big enough for people to go, 'Let me throw money at you because you're so famous!'
author: Nikki Reed

quote: I wrote because I needed to and wanted to. It never occurred to me that I'd become famous.
author: Danielle Steel

quote: The records of adopted children are sealed in California. That seal is considered inviolable... The judge ruled that, because I was famous, he didn't have the same rights as other kids.
author: Danielle Steel

quote: People are much more inclined to believe and say bad things about you if you're famous.
author: Danielle Steel

quote: I'm astonished by my success. I wrote because I needed to and wanted to. It never occurred to me that I'd become famous.
author: Danielle Steel

quote: I don't really consider myself to be famous.
author: Victoria Justice

quote: I think when you're on a network show, it's crazy how different it is... just being on a network show that reaches that many people. It's not like I'm very famous, but seemingly overnight, I would get recognized more, and it was really weird.
author: Adam Scott

quote: I'm focused on the next generation, because I think it's very hard to break the habit of adults who've got salt and sugar addictions and just ways of being in this world. It's very hard even for the most enlightened people at famous universities that are very wealthy to spend the money that it takes to feed the students something delicious.
author: Alice Waters

quote: I mostly go under the radar, which is fantastic because I would not be a good famous person.
author: Gillian Flynn

quote: This whole segregation between famous people and other people is complete rubbish.
author: Maisie Williams

quote: No one teaches you how to be a famous person; no one teaches you how to be a role model. It's something you have to do on your own.
author: Maisie Williams

quote: You hear horror stories about scary mothers who just want their kids to be famous. I could be waitressing in a restaurant, and my mum would be happy as long as I was happy.
author: Maisie Williams

quote: It was never about winning medals or being famous.
author: Nancy Kerrigan

quote: I think there are a lot of people who really want to be famous, they really do. I don't. It sort of gets in the way of the everyday things that I do.
author: Johnny Mathis

quote: Sometimes being famous gets in the way of doing what you want to do.
author: Johnny Mathis

quote: I didn't get hugely famous really quick. It was a slow, gradual process, so I was able to sort of grow into myself and figure out who I was and what I wanted without the glaring spotlight on me telling me who I was.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: I have so much empathy for these young actors that are 19 and all of a sudden they're beautiful and famous and rich. I'm like, 'Oh my God, I'd be dead.'
author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quote: I think it would be really brutal to put on a persona and get famous for that persona. Like, 'I'm number one, I'm the best!' because that sounds like a lot of pressure.
author: Andy Grammer

quote: I've never done this from a standpoint of, 'I want to be famous.' I sing because I love singing. I perform because I love performing.
author: Ne-Yo

quote: There are a lot of good things about being famous but there are a few not so good things too.
author: Sharon Stone

quote: There's precedent for adjudicatory proceedings on technology issues to have massive consumer and business benefits. One of the most famous was the so-called Carterfone decision in 1968.
author: Walt Mossberg

quote: The day before I was famous in Denmark, nobody looked my way. The day after, everybody wanted to talk to me.
author: Mads Mikkelsen

quote: I do probably come down a little hard on a group of people I call the 'blue chip gays.' I mean people who have managed to become very, very famous and are still very famous partly through staying in the closet, like Jasper Johns, Cy Twombly, Susan Sontag, Harold Brodkey and others.
author: Edmund White

quote: We played at a festival in Mexico City, at the same time as another famous artist, and I reckon we had 55,000 people watching New Order; the other had 7,000. I think from that I've discovered the secret of success in the music industry: don't do any promotion.
author: Bernard Sumner

quote: It may sound strange to say it of someone so famous, but I think Leonardo DiCaprio is underrated, particularly from an awards perspective. He is a very versatile actor. He started very young, and 'What's Eating Gilbert Grape?' is one of my favourite films.
author: Will Poulter

quote: The death of a famous person is different from the death of a loved one, whether it is Michael Jackson, Frank McCourt, or Walter Cronkite. We didn't know any of them personally, and yet, we experience a sense of loss.
author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quote: I think Chris Martin is younger than I am, but when I met him, I felt like I was talking to my father. It's so strange, that feeling when someone is that famous - you assume that they are either older or better.
author: Jenny Lewis
